casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Richard CAMPBELL Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 13, 2016

Glenn W. Folk, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Laurie N. Feldman, special deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn.App. 156, 149 A.3d 1007 (2016), is denied.
